H0.text: In measurement, a hand is equal to how many inches. 3

H1.text: In measurement, a hand is equal to how many inches. 5

H2.text: In measurement, a hand is equal to how many inches. 6

H3.text: In measurement, a hand is equal to how many inches. 4

A4.text: The hand is a non-SI unit of measurement of length standardized to 4 in (101.6 mm).

A5.text: Thus, a horse that measures 60 inches is 15 hands high (15 Ã— 4 = 60)
